name: Mountain Roll
description:
Made for the GMTK 2022 Game Jam!

You are Dicey!
You got on top of a mountain and now you wanna get down to the ground.
Why am I on top of a mountain?
Good question! We don't know how you got up there either!

Get ready to fling yourself...

This game only requires a mouse to play!
Left click and send Dicey flying multiple miles an hour!
Try reaching the end goal at each of the levels.


Only one way to find out!
But here's a list of cool features in the game:

  • 5 Cool Levels (feat. Mountain Dice)!
  • Deep Conversations with Tutodice!
  • Awesome Collectables scattered around the Levels!
  • Flying, Jumping, Flicking and Rolling!
  • AMAZING Credits Scene!

Made by:
Dániel Mayer - Lead Dev, Programming, Music
Tamás Szép - Programming, Art, Concept
